guess_format(filename)[source]¶

Tries to guess the input format using several criteria: the extension first and, if unsuccessful, by the matrix shape

Parameters:filename – input text file
Returns:guessed format, header and separator

Uses csv.Sniffer to detect the delimiter in the first line of a table.

Parameters:filename – input file
Returns:the separator as a string
